TopicTitle: Proof of Concept: ULA Vulcan-Style Engine Reuse

Articles.Content: Wanted to see if I could do this using the new inflatable heat shield in 1.1.  Turned out to work pretty well.  A mid-air recovery would be impractical in KSP, but there's no penalty for splashing down.
Now, if they had salt damage...
Hmmm... I'm wondering how profitable it would be to do this for LV-N clusters.
